page.title: 17Recreation+Leisure/Turnditch
page.content:
5 {Guides and Brownies}both meet on a Tuesday evening at the W.I. Hut under the auspices of Mrs.J.Little and Mrs.J.Vallance.
6 { Idridgehay Pre-School Playgroup meet at the W.I.Hut on Tuesday and Thursdays from 10.00 until 12.00. There is a {Mother and Toddler group which meet on Wednesdays from 10.00 until 11.30.Both these groups serve the area covered by the parishes of Turnditch, Kirk Ireton and Idridgehay.
7 {Sunday Schools}are currently held at Green Bank Chapel and Windley Baptist Chapel.
8 { Evening Classes }are held in the school. Creative Embroidery takes place on Tuesday evenings.
